org.jpasecurity.persistence

Class SecureQuery<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpasecurity.persistence.DelegatingQuery<T>
      • org.jpasecurity.persistence.SecureQuery<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.persistence.Query, javax.persistence.TypedQuery<T>

    public class SecureQuery<T>
extends DelegatingQuery<T>
    This class handles invocations on queries.

    Arne Limburg
